snapchat.title: Snapchat
snapchat.info1: Snapchat is a multimedia messaging app
snapchat.info2: It is known for its disappearing messages and filters
snapchat.info3: Snapchat has over 280 million daily active users

tiktok.title: TikTok
tiktok.info1: TikTok is a social media app for short-form videos
tiktok.info2: It has become very popular among young people
tiktok.info3: TikTok has over 1 billion active users worldwide

bereal.title: BeReal
bereal.info1: BeReal is a social media app for honest and authentic sharing
bereal.info2: It allows users to share real moments without filters or editing
bereal.info3: BeReal is focused on building genuine connections
